jade.core
Class Messenger

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Messenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Actor, World
public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class respresents an object that can remember String messages, and retrieve messages from other messengers. Both jade World and Actor extend this class with the motivation that the world could then retrieve all the messages of its actors and store them in one place for easy access.

See Also:

Method Detail

clearMessages

public void clearMessages()
Clears the messenger's messages

appendMessage

public void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
Adds a message for the messenger to remember. If the message does not end with ". " it will be appended as well.

Parameters:
message - the message to be stored

retrieveMessages

public void retrieveMessages(Messenger messenger)
Retrieves and clears all messeges of the specified messenger and adds them to this messenger's messages.

Parameters:
messenger - the messenger whos messages are to be retrieved

getMessages

public java.lang.String getMessages()
Returns and clears this messengers messages.

Returns:
The messengers messegages.
